name: Mars Mission plus Astro Blaster
overview: Mars Mission A single player Lunar Rescue style space shooter written by Richard Arundale. You're tasked with rescuing your fellow astronauts stranded on the planet surface. To land safely on the designated sites you will need to avoid the swarms of asteroids. If you succeed, you are then faced with marauding, mine-laying aliens on your return flight to the mothership. Astro Blaster A single player scrolling space shooter written by John Wilson. You command the S.S. Destroyer in 3D space. Your mission is to patrol the asteroid belt, and by destroying them as they hurtle towards you, make the Universe a safer place to live in. This is made no easier by alien ships which attack relentlessly. With every few waves you will need to refuel by docking with your mothership.
